netflow documentation#

Date: Mar 01, 2024 Version: 0.0.dev

netflow is an open-source software for analyzing and visualizing relationships among observations leveraging multi-modal and multi-scale features.

Installation

How to install netflow.

To the installation guide

User guide

The user guide contains an overview of the key netflow modules and uses with some useful background and explanations.

To the user guide

Tutorials

Tutorials on the data structure and main pipelines can be found here

To the tutorials

API reference

The reference guide contains a detailed description of the netflow API. The reference describes how the methods work and which parameters can be used. It assumes that you have an understanding of the key concepts.

To the reference guide
